  • java.lang.Object
    • WakefulAlarmListener
      • com.ibm.mce.sdk.plugin.inbox.InboxUpdateService

  • public class InboxUpdateService
extends WakefulAlarmListener
    This class is the service that syncs the inbox db with the server
